exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="28"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="AboutViewSkin" width="720" height="1200" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Rect id="rect_mask" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" left="0" fillAlpha="0.2" locked="true" />
    <e:Group horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="98%" height="490">
        <e:Rect width="100%" height="60" fillAlpha="0.9" fillColor="0xeeeeee" top="0" />
        <e:Rect width="100%" height="430" fillAlpha="0.8" fillColor="0x000000" bottom="0" />
        <e:Label height="60" width="180" text="关于" x="20" y="0" textColor="0x000000" textAlign="left"
                 verticalAlign="middle" bold="true" />
        <e:Scroller width="95%" height="400" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="15">
            <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
                <e:Label id="label_content" width="100%" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei" textColor="0xffffff" text=""
                          lineSpacing="10"></e:Label>
            </e:Group>
        </e:Scroller>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="SceneIndexSkin" width="720" height="1200" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image top="0" bottom="0" left="0" right="0" source="index_background_png"  anchorOffsetX="0"  verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_start2" x="270" y="414.67" label="联网对战" anchorOffsetX="0" width="180" anchorOffsetY="0" height="79.33"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_about" label="关于" x="270" y="541.67" anchorOffsetX="0" width="180" anchorOffsetY="0" height="68.67"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="DialogSkin" width="600" height="300" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" fillAlpha="0.8" fillColor="0x000000" />
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0">
        <e:Group id="moveArea" width="100%" height="60">
            <e:Image left="0" top="0" source="header_png" width="100%" height="100%" />
            <e:Label id="label_title" text="" size="30" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei" textColor="0xFFFFFF" left="15"
                     verticalCenter="0.5" anchorOffsetY="0" height="100%" verticalAlign="middle" width="50%" />
        </e:Group>
        <e:Group width="100%" height="240">
            <e:Group width="100%" height="80%">
                <e:Image id="img_icon" left="0" top="0" source="header_png" width="80" height="80" />
                <e:Label id="label_content" width="480" height="90%" text="" size="35" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei"
                         wordWrap="false" anchorOffsetX="0"  textColor="0xfcfcfc"/>
                <e:layout>
                    <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="top" horizontalAlign="center" gap="10" />
                </e:layout>
            </e:Group>
            <e:Group id="group_btns" width="100%" height="80">
                <e:Button id="btn_confirm" label="确定" height="60" width="120" />
                <e:Button id="btn_cancel" label="取消" width="120" height="60" />
                <e:layout>
                    <e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="top" gap="150" />
                </e:layout>
            </e:Group>
            <e:layout>
                <e:VerticalLayout/>
            </e:layout>
        </e:Group>
        <e:layout>
            <e:VerticalLayout/>
        </e:layout>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="NetIndexViewSkin" width="720" height="1200" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Rect id="rect_mask" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" left="0" fillAlpha="0" locked="true" />
    <e:Group horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="98%" height="600">
        <e:Group width="100%" height="60">
            <e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" fillAlpha="0.9" fillColor="0xeeeeee" top="0" />
            <e:Label height="100%" width="180" text="进入房间" x="20" y="0" textColor="0x000000" textAlign="left"
                     verticalAlign="middle" bold="true" />
        </e:Group>
        <e:Group width="100%" height="540">
            <e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" fillAlpha="0.8" fillColor="0x000000" bottom="0" />
            <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
                <e:Button id="btn_newPeople" label="新手区" x="46.82" y="28" anchorOffsetY="0" height="224.3" anchorOffsetX="0"
                          width="263.52" />
                <e:Label id="label_peopleNum" height="49.09" width="251.64" text="在线人数:" x="52.76" y="270" textColor="0xfcfcfc"
                         textAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle" bold="true"  anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0"/>
            </e:Group>
        </e:Group>
			<e:layout>
				<e:VerticalLayout/>
			</e:layout>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="LoginViewSkin" width="720" height="1200" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"
        xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
    <e:Rect id="rect_mask" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" left="0" fillAlpha="0" locked="true" />
    <e:Group horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="98%" height="490">
        <e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" fillAlpha="0.8" fillColor="0x000000" bottom="0" />
        <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
            <e:TabBar id="tabBar" width="100%" height="60"></e:TabBar>
            <e:ViewStack id="viewStack" width="100%">
                <e:Group width="100%" height="100%" name="登录">
                    <e:Label id="label_login_hint" width="285.34" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei" textColor="0xffffff" text="" 
                    lineSpacing="10" x="404" y="15" textAlign="center" anchorOffsetY="0" height="166" 
                    verticalAlign="middle" anchorOffsetX="0"></e:Label>
 
                    <e:Label width="120" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei" textColor="0xffffff" text="用户名:" lineSpacing="10" x="50" y="15"></e:Label>
                    <e:EditableText id="edit_userName" textColor="0x2233cc" x="170" y="15" anchorOffsetX="0" width="218"
                                    anchorOffsetY="0" height="40" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left"
                                    backgroundColor="0xffffff" background="true" />
                    <e:Label width="88" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei" textColor="0xffffff" text="密码:" lineSpacing="10" x="66" y="81"
                             anchorOffsetX="0"></e:Label>
                    <e:EditableText id="edit_userPwd" textColor="0x2233cc" x="170" y="81" anchorOffsetX="0" width="218"
                                    anchorOffsetY="0" height="40" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left"
                                    backgroundColor="0xffffff" background="true" displayAsPassword="true" />
                    <e:Button id="btn_login" label="登录" x="104" y="209.09" />
                </e:Group>
                <e:Group width="100%" height="423" name="注册" anchorOffsetY="0">
                
                    <e:Label id="label_sign_hint" width="285.34" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei" textColor="0xffffff" text="" 
                    lineSpacing="10" x="404" y="15" textAlign="center" anchorOffsetY="0" height="166" 
                    verticalAlign="middle" anchorOffsetX="0"></e:Label>

                    <e:Label width="120" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei" textColor="0xffffff" text="用户名:" 
                    lineSpacing="10" x="40" y="15" textAlign="right" anchorOffsetY="0" height="40.67" 
                    verticalAlign="middle"></e:Label>
                    <e:EditableText id="edit_sign_userName" textColor="0x2233cc" x="170" y="15.67" anchorOffsetX="0"
                                    width="218" anchorOffsetY="0" height="40" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left"
                                    backgroundColor="0xffffff" background="true" />
                    <e:Label width="109.33" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei" textColor="0xffffff" text="密码:" lineSpacing="10" x="50" y="81"
                             anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" height="38" textAlign="right"></e:Label>
                    <e:EditableText id="edit_sign_userPwd" textColor="0x2233cc" x="170" y="81" anchorOffsetX="0"
                                    width="218" anchorOffsetY="0" height="40" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left"
                                    backgroundColor="0xffffff" background="true" displayAsPassword="true" />
                    <e:Label width="136" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei" textColor="0xffffff" text="确认密码:" lineSpacing="10" x="32" y="139"
                             anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" height="38" verticalAlign="middle"></e:Label>
                    <e:EditableText id="edit_sign_userPwd2" textColor="0x2233cc" x="170" y="139" anchorOffsetX="0"
                                    width="218" anchorOffsetY="0" height="40" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left"
                                    backgroundColor="0xffffff" background="true" displayAsPassword="true" />
                    <e:Label width="133.33" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei" textColor="0xffffff" text="注册邮箱:" lineSpacing="10" x="32" y="203.33"
                             anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" height="40.67" verticalAlign="middle"></e:Label>
                    <e:EditableText id="edit_sign_email" textColor="0x2233cc" x="168" y="204" anchorOffsetX="0"
                                    width="218" anchorOffsetY="0" height="40" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left"
                                    backgroundColor="0xffffff" background="true" />
                    <e:Button id="btn_register" x="104.67" y="324.67" label="注册"  anchorOffsetX="0" width="132" anchorOffsetY="0" height="60.67"/>
                </e:Group>
            </e:ViewStack>
					<e:layout>
						<e:VerticalLayout/>
					</e:layout>
        </e:Group>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="NetRoomViewSkin" width="720" height="1200" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Rect id="rect_mask" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" left="0" fillAlpha="0" locked="true" />
    <e:Group horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="98%" height="600">
        <e:Group width="100%" height="60">
            <e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" fillAlpha="0.9" fillColor="0xeeeeee" top="0" />
            <e:Label height="60" width="180" text="房间信息" x="20" y="0" textColor="0x000000" textAlign="left"
                     verticalAlign="middle" bold="true" />
        </e:Group>
        <e:Group width="100%" height="540">
            <e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" fillAlpha="0.8" fillColor="0x000000" bottom="0" />
            <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
                <e:Group width="100%" height="10%" bottom="0">
                    <e:Label id="label_room" width="90%" height="100%" x="20"  textAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle"/>
                </e:Group>
                <e:Group width="100%" height="70%">
                    <e:Group width="40%" height="100%">
                        <e:Label id="label_p11" width="80%" height="40%" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" />
                        <e:Label id="label_p12" width="80%" height="20%"  x="32.75" y="132" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
                        <e:Label id="label_p13" width="80%" height="20%"  verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
                        <e:layout>
                            <e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" />
                        </e:layout>
                    </e:Group>
                    <e:Group width="20%" height="100%">
                        <e:Label width="100%" height="50%" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" verticalCenter="0"
                                 text="VS" size="50" border="true" bold="false" />
                    </e:Group>
                    <e:Group width="40%" height="100%">
                        <e:Label id="label_p21" width="80%" height="40%" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" />
                        <e:Label id="label_p22" width="80%" height="20%"  verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
                        <e:Label id="label_p23" width="80%" height="20%"  verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
                        <e:layout>
                            <e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" />
                        </e:layout>
                    </e:Group>
                    <e:layout>
                        <e:HorizontalLayout/>
                    </e:layout>
                </e:Group>
                <e:Group width="100%" height="20%" bottom="0">
                    <e:Button id="btn_ready" label="准备"  width="30%" height="80%"/>
                    <e:Button id="btn_change" label="换桌"  width="30%" height="80%"/>
                    <e:Button id="btn_leave" label="离开"  width="30%" height="80%"/>
                    <e:layout>
                        <e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="top" gap="15" />
                    </e:layout>
                </e:Group>
                <e:layout>
                    <e:VerticalLayout/>
                </e:layout>
            </e:Group>
        </e:Group>
			<e:layout>
				<e:VerticalLayout/>
			</e:layout>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Group id="group_dialog" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="98%" height="600" touchThrough="true">
         <e:Group width="100%" height="20%" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0">

         </e:Group>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin width="720" height="1200" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" fillColor="0xffffff" />
    <e:Group id="group_background" width="100%" height="100%" cacheAsBitmap="true"></e:Group>
    <e:Group id="group_chessGroup" width="100%" height="100%"></e:Group>
    <e:Group id="group_option" width="100%" height="100%" touchThrough="true">
        <e:Label id="label_toast" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei" textColor="0xffffff" y="100" anchorOffsetX="0"
                 anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="0" width="80%" lineSpacing="15" minHeight="60"  backgroundColor="0x111010" 
                 borderColor="0x000000" background="true" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
        <e:Button id="btn_menu" x="140" anchorOffsetX="15" width="60" height="60" anchorOffsetY="15" verticalCenter="0">
            <e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
                <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5" source="setting_menu_png"
                         source.down="setting_menu_png" />
            </e:Skin>
        </e:Button>
        <e:Button id="btn_back" x="250" anchorOffsetX="15" width="60" height="60" anchorOffsetY="15" verticalCenter="0">
            <e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
                <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5" source="home_png"
                         source.down="home_png" />
            </e:Skin>
        </e:Button>
        <e:Label id="label_msg" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei" width="40%" height="50"
                 verticalCenter="0"  horizontalCenter="55%" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Group id="group_secondPage" width="100%" height="100%" touchThrough="true"></e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="StartSettingViewSkin" width="720" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Rect id="rect_mask" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" left="0" fillAlpha="0" locked="true" />
    <e:Group horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="98%" height="360">
        <e:Rect width="100%" height="60" fillAlpha="0.9" fillColor="0xeeeeee" top="0" />
        <e:Rect width="100%" height="300" fillAlpha="0.8" fillColor="0x000000" bottom="0" />
        <e:Label height="60" width="180" x="20" y="0" textColor="0x000000" text="开始游戏" textAlign="left"
                 verticalAlign="middle" bold="true" />
        <e:Scroller width="96%" height="270" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="15">
            <e:Group width="100%">
                <e:Image source="ask_icon_png" width="70" height="70" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" x="10" y="5"/>
                <e:Label text="确定要重新开始?" textAlign="left" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei" textColor="0xffffff" width="80%"
                         lineSpacing="10" size="28" horizontalCenter="28" y="25"></e:Label>
                <e:Button id="btn_ok" x="186" y="194" height="60"  label="确定"/>
                <e:Button id="btn_cancel" x="367" y="194" height="60"  label="取消"/>
            </e:Group>
        </e:Scroller>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="VictoryViewSkin" width="720" height="1200" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
    <e:Rect id="rect_mask" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" left="0" fillAlpha="0" locked="true" />
    <e:Group horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="98%" height="490">
        <e:Rect width="100%" height="60" fillAlpha="0.9" fillColor="0xeeeeee" top="0" />

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="MenuViewgSkin" width="720" height="1200" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"

        <e:Group width="95%" height="95%" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0">

                <e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">

                    <e:Label bottom="0" height="30" horizontalCenter="0" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei"
                             textColor="0xF9B683" size="32" text="战况统计" />

                    <e:Label bottom="0" height="30" horizontalCenter="0" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei"
                             textColor="0xF9B683" size="32" text="登录" />
                </e:Skin>
            </e:Button>
            <e:Button id="btn_personal" width="150" height="150">
                <e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
                    <e:Image top="5" width="110" height="110" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" horizontalCenter="0"
                             alpha.disabled="0.5" source="" source.down="" />
                    <e:Label bottom="0" height="30" horizontalCenter="0" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei"
                             textColor="0xF9B683" size="32" text="个人中心" />

            </e:Button>
            <e:Button id="btn_giveUp" width="150" height="150">
                <e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
                    <e:Image top="5" width="110" height="110" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" horizontalCenter="0"
                             alpha.disabled="0.5" source="" source.down="" />
                    <e:Label bottom="0" height="30" horizontalCenter="0" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei"
                             textColor="0xF9B683" size="32" text="认输" />
                </e:Skin>
            </e:Button>
            <e:Button id="btn_peace" width="150" height="150">
                <e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
                    <e:Image top="5" width="110" height="110" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" horizontalCenter="0"
                             alpha.disabled="0.5" source="" source.down="" />
                    <e:Label bottom="0" height="30" horizontalCenter="0" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei"
                             textColor="0xF9B683" size="32" text="求和" />

            <e:Button id="btn_talk" width="150" height="150">
                <e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
                    <e:Image top="5" width="110" height="110" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" horizontalCenter="0"
                             alpha.disabled="0.5" source="" source.down="" />
                    <e:Label bottom="0" height="30" horizontalCenter="0" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei"
                             textColor="0xF9B683" size="32" text="聊天" />
                </e:Skin>
            </e:Button>
            <e:layout>
                <e:TileLayout orientation="rows" requestedRowCount="2" requestedColumnCount="4" verticalAlign="middle"
                              horizontalAlign="center"  rowHeight="150" columnWidth="150" columnAlign="justifyUsingGap" 
                              rowAlign="justifyUsingHeight" paddingLeft="0" paddingRight="0" horizontalGap="10" verticalGap="10"/>
            </e:layout>
        </e:Group>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

                             anchorOffsetX="0"></e:Label>

                                    anchorOffsetY="0" height="40" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left"

                    <e:Label width="120" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei" textColor="0xffffff" text="用户名:" lineSpacing="10" x="50" y="15"></e:Label>
                    <e:EditableText id="edit_sign_userName" textColor="0x2233cc" x="170" y="15" anchorOffsetX="0"

                                    backgroundColor="0xffffff" background="true" />
                    <e:Label width="88" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei" textColor="0xffffff" text="密码:" lineSpacing="10" x="66" y="81"
                             anchorOffsetX="0"></e:Label>
                    <e:EditableText id="edit_sign_userPwd" textColor="0x2233cc" x="170" y="81" anchorOffsetX="0"
                                    width="218" anchorOffsetY="0" height="40" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left"
                                    backgroundColor="0xffffff" background="true" displayAsPassword="true" />
                    <e:Label width="88" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei" textColor="0xffffff" text="确认密码:" lineSpacing="10" x="66" y="81"
                             anchorOffsetX="0"></e:Label>
                    <e:EditableText id="edit_sign_userPwd2" textColor="0x2233cc" x="170" y="81" anchorOffsetX="0"
                                    width="218" anchorOffsetY="0" height="40" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left"
                                    backgroundColor="0xffffff" background="true" displayAsPassword="true" />
                    <e:Label width="88" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei" textColor="0xffffff" text="注册邮箱:" lineSpacing="10" x="66" y="81"
                             anchorOffsetX="0"></e:Label>
                    <e:EditableText id="edit_sign_email" textColor="0x2233cc" x="170" y="81" anchorOffsetX="0"

                <e:Button id="btn_regist" x="110" y="306" label="注册" />

                </e:layout>
            </e:Group>

        </e:Group>
